hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Neutral Transition via Memecoin Volume Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: During BULL regime, when PEPE and DOGE show >150% volume spikes but price gains <5% (divergence), and BTC fails to make new weekly highs for 3 days, the market transitions to NEUTRAL within 2 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoin volume spikes without price appreciation during bull markets signal retail exhaustion and 'weak hands' entering late. Combined with BTC momentum stall, indicates impending regime shift.
entry_conditions: PEPE 24h volume > 150% of 7-day average with price change <5%
BTC fails to make new 7-day high for 3 consecutive days
Reduce long exposure by 50% across portfolio

exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC makes new 7-day high with >8% volume increase

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Memecoins continue rallying with volume, or BTC resumes uptrend with strong momentum despite the signal.
